rules_text:
Slumber 3–{1}{U} [i](If you cast this for its slumber cost, it enters the battlefield tapped with three stun counters on it. If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
When Zombie Eaters enters the battlefield, surveil 1, then draw a card. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
